text: Dylan Baker (born October 7, 1959) is an American actor. He is known for his roles in Happiness, Planes, Trains and Automobiles, Trick 'r Treat, Spider-Man 3, and in Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues. Baker was born in Syracuse, New York, but was raised in Lynchburg, Virginia. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Virginia Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:People from Lynchburg, Virginia Category:Actors from Syracuse, New York Category:Yale University alumni
title: Dylan Baker
